name: Imported Pomegranate
description: Pomegranates are one of the healthiest foods on the planet, packed with nutrients and powerful plant compounds. They have wide-ranging benefits and may help reduce your risk of various serious illnesses, including heart disease, cancer, arthritis and other inflammatory conditions. What’s more, they may boost your memory and exercise performance. [Source: www.healthline.com] Disclaimer: Please note that the image is used for presentation purposes only.
